original_text: ‘I have chosen you to bring righteousness. I will take hold of your hand, and I will keep you safe. Through you, I will make a covenant with my people, and you will bring light to the other nations. ‘I have chosen you to bring righteousness.
korean_text: 나 여호와가 의로 너를 불렀은즉 내가 네 손을 잡아 너를 보호하며 너를 세워 백성의 언약과 이방의 빛이 되게 하리니

sentences.original_text: I have chosen you to bring righteousness.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 선택하여 의를 가져오게 하였다.

sentences.original_text: I will take hold of your hand,
and I will keep you safe.
Through you, I will make a covenant with my people,
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 통하여, 나는 내 백성과 언약을 맺을 것이다,

sentences.original_text: and you will bring light to the other nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 다른 민족들에게 빛을 가져올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I have chosen you to bring righteousness.
